# Government Tender Announcement

**Title**: New Archive Room Development
**Reference Number**: WS3705707468-Doc3723057324
**Modification Number**: 4
**Solicitation Number**: WS3705707468

### Tender Details
* **Posting Date**: 2022-11-21
* **Closure Date**: 2023-01-17T14:00:00
* **Modification Date**: 2022-12-16

### Proposal Type
* **Tender Type**: Request for Proposal
* **Procurement Method**: Competitive - Open bidding
* **Selection Criteria**: Lowest Price

### Proposal Description
The Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC), on behalf of Correctional Service Canada (CSC), invites proposals from construction contractors to develop new archive rooms in a part of the existing building A-2 at Archambault Institution located in Sainte-Anne-des-Plaines, Quebec, Canada. The project involves fitting out the new spaces for archives as detailed in Annex A.

### Tender Submission Requirements
All proposed supporting documentation and bids must be submitted by 2023-01-17T14:00:00.

### Contract Information
* **Contract Start Date**: 2022-12-12 (anticipated)
* **Contract End Date**: 2023-06-30 (anticipated)
* **Contracting Entity**: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
* **End User Entity**: Correctional Service Canada (CSC)

### Contact Information
For more information, please contact Stephen Phan at [stephen.phan@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:stephen.phan@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca).

### Additional Details
* **Gross National Income Sector (GSIN)**: None
* **United Nations Standard Products and Services Code (UNSPSC)**: 72120000 - Nonresidential building construction services
* **Trade Agreements**: Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
* **Region of Opportunity**: Quebec (except NCR)
* **Region of Delivery**: Quebec (except NCR)

I made sure to remove any unnecessary text and ensured to rephrase the paragraph with proper grammar and sentence structure. I also highlighted the most important information under separate headings for better readability. Let me know if you need me to clarify or change anything.
